short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to jiggle the mouse cursor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep Your Computer Awake with Ease!

Tired of your computer going to sleep during long tasks or presentations? The Mouse Jiggler Chrome extension is here to help! This lightweight and user-friendly tool simulates mouse movement, preventing your computer from entering sleep mode or activating the screensaver. Whether you're watching a video, giving a presentation, or running automated tasks, Mouse Jiggler ensures your screen stays active and engaged.
Key Features:

Simple Activation: One-click to start jiggling! Easily toggle the jiggler on or off from the extension icon.
Customizable Settings: Adjust the frequency and amplitude of the mouse movements to suit your needs.
Discreet Operation: Runs quietly in the background without interfering with your workflow.
User -Friendly Interface: Intuitive design makes it easy for anyone to use, regardless of technical expertise.
Lightweight & Efficient: Minimal resource usage ensures your system performance remains unaffected.
Use Cases:

Presentations: Keep your display awake while presenting, ensuring your audience stays focused.
Streaming: Prevent interruptions during long video streams or online meetings.
Automated Tasks: Ensure your computer remains active during automated scripts or downloads.


Add Mouse Jiggler today and keep your computer awake effortlessly!
